text: is a town located in Sorachi Subprefecture, Hokkaido, Japan. As of September 2016, the town has an estimated population of 5,664. The total area is 88.05 km². Naie is linked with the Dōō Expressway or the Dōō Expressway (Hokkaidō Expressway) with its interchange. In the past the town flourished as a centre of the coal industry, but its population has since declined sharply. ==External links== * *Official Website Category:Towns in Hokkaido
title: Naie, Hokkaido
